long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Redditor Reborn, your free companion for taking control of your Reddit experience! This Chrome extension empowers users by offering a convenient solution to delete all comments and posts with ease. Whether you're redefining your digital presence, safeguarding your privacy, or simply starting anew, Redditor Reborn streamlines the process, providing a user-friendly interface for efficient content management. Take charge of your Reddit history effortlessly and enjoy a refreshed experience.

Current features : 
- Delete all your comments in one go
- Delete all your posts in one go
- View the current number of comments and posts

Future features : 
- Advanced deletion by subreddit, upvote score, etc...
- Bulk edit and delete
